law.text: Any city-county department of health established under KRS 212.350 or 212.640 shall be entitled to the same state aid as is provided for county and district health departments under KRS 212.120, upon notice of the establishment of the department being given to the Cabinet for Health and Family Services as provided in KRS 212.120.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 419, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 370, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 213, sec. 1. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 8.
